rules: You many not create edits that could be misinformative and/or not related to the wiki content. Always keep the wiki content informative and related.
You many not link a Reference to an off-site website not inside the wiki.wolfdo.gg domain.
You may not vandalize the wiki content. Even on the source of the wiki content. (like HTML comments)
If you ever add new or copied Information to a Wiki, always add Attributions/Sources at the very bottom of the Wiki Page.
